Title: All Aboard!
Description:
You hear all of that, $n? There are Alliance that need killing and I need to round up a veteran crew.

You're coming with me!

We won't be returning until our assignment's complete, so round up your things and make ready.

I'll be aboard a newly commissioned gunship over Bladefist Bay.

Don't keep me waiting!
ObjectivesText: Speak to General Nazgrim aboard Hellscream's Fist.
RewardText:
Welcome aboard Hellscream's Fist, $n!

This'll be her maiden voyage. Ain't she a beauty?

Objectives.Text: Secure a flight to Hellscream's Fist
Speak to General Nazgrim aboard Hellscream's Fist
